title: Strategic Planning and Organizational Learning: Capability Enhancement Through Critical Research Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational management and strategic planning, project management experience
context.additional_context: Providing collaborative and case analysis environments using digital devices, emphasizing experiential learning focused on practical applications

learning_goals: Critically analyze the impact of power dynamics within organizations on strategic planning and learning processes.
Diagnose learning barriers occurring during the strategic formation process based on real-world cases and propose improvement strategies.
Strengthen practical competencies in designing continuous learning mechanisms for organizations through project-based collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
